committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Insurance

official_title: To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to provide the same deposit insurance treatment for deposits of State and local government and nonprofit organization deferred compensation plans as is provided for deposits of Keogh plans and individual retirement accounts.
short_title: Section 457 Plans Deposit Insurance Protection Act

summary.text: Section 457 Plans Deposit Insurance Protection Act - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to provide the same deposit insurance treatment for deposits of State and local government and tax-exempt nonprofit organization deferred compensation plans as is provided for deposits of Keogh plans and individual retirement accounts.

titles.title: Section 457 Plans Deposit Insurance Protection Act

To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to provide the same deposit insurance treatment for deposits of State and local government and nonprofit organization deferred compensation plans as is provided for deposits of Keogh plans and individual retirement accounts.
